nodes.documentation:
@notice pickWinner can only be called by the owner and requires
the lottery to be closed, still waiting for a good source 
of random generator, we will use the blockhash for the moment
check if there are winners, if yes, divide the jackpot between
winners and add it to the refund mapping
nodes.name: pickWinner

nodes.documentation: @notice we just using blockhash fro the moment to set the lottery result
nodes.name: _setResult
_refund
attempNewLottery

nodes.documentation: @notice Transfer the jackpot nobody won the lottery to a the newLottery
nodes.name: _transferJackPot

nodes.documentation: @notice withdraw the whole amount stored in the refunds mapping
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.name: getPlayers

nodes.documentation: @notice This is used only for testing purpose, has to be deleted
